mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.keys "keys", t.value "value" from t_cas_keyvalue t where 1=1 and t.keys like CONCAT('%','${keys}','%' ) and value=#{value} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_cas_keyvalue t where 1=1 and t.keys like CONCAT('%','${keys}','%' ) and value=#{value} ) a
select * from t_cas_keyvalue t where 1=1 and t.keys like CONCAT('%','${keys}','%' )
mapper.insert: insert into t_cas_keyvalue ( id ,keys ,value ) values ( id ,#{keys} ,#{value} )
mapper.update: update t_cas_keyvalue set id=#{id} ,keys=#{keys} ,value=#{value} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.keys "keys", t.value "value" from t_cas_keyvalue t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and keys=#{keys} and value=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from t_cas_keyvalue where 1=1 and id=#{id}
